description.value: Security observation values used to indicate security control metadata. V:SecurityControl is the union of V:SecurityPolicy, V:ObligationPolicy, V:RefrainPolicy, V:PurposeOfUse, and V:GeneralPurpose of Use, V:PrivacyMark, V:SecurityLabelMark, and V:ControlledUnclassifiedInformation used to populate the SecurityControlObservationValue attribute in order to convey one or more nonhierarchical security control metadata dictating handling caveats including, purpose of use, obligation policy, refrain policy, dissemination controls and privacy marks to which a custodian or receiver is required to comply.
